subject: Crypto News. July 18, 2025
body:
View this post on the web at https://www.cryptointegrat.com/p/crypto-news-july-18-2025

Vare Crypto News is live ft Euler Labs, Brahma, Hyperliquid, JPMorgan
Live on YouTube:
https://youtube.com/shorts/TPoBacEvXos [ https://substack.com/redirect/c4d9eb4e-e07e-46fd-9f70-7daee4e9b205?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Live on TikTok:
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMSnhK64L/ [ https://substack.com/redirect/477adccb-7ed0-4302-8594-cb2b1a02de35?j=eyJ1IjoiNXZxdTAzIn0.8gObup55391UiysY1BATCN5wRc6MUJZaZgak5YGfZYw ]
Please subscribe.
DeFi
Hyperliquid generated $6M in fees in the past 24 hours, making a new ATH and on a 7 day straight record of oopen interest ATHs, now at $13.8B
Euler Labs partnered with Brahma to launch Swype.fun a credit card on Base that lets users make real world purchases with crypto without selling their assets. The card works by borrowing USDC against the users onchain positions on Euler or AAVE
JPMorgan analysts say regulators outside US, like the Bank of England prefer tokenized bank deposits over stablecoins
